note.p: Tug-boat contractor. Theology student, Stockton-on-Tees, 1871. Merchant and ship owner, 1881. Tug-boat contractor, retired by 1911.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/4902/137/14), 1891 (RG12/4032/49/12), 1911 (RG14/29564)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 March 2013)
